title: Unsafe ActiveX Control Marked Safe For Scripting
overview: This might allow attackers to use dangerous functionality via a web page that accesses the control, which can lead to different resultant vulnerabilities, depending on the control&#x27;s behavior.
remediation: ::PHASE:Architecture and Design:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:During development, do not mark it as safe for scripting.::PHASE:System Configuration:STRATEGY::EFFECTIVENESS::DESCRIPTION:After distribution, you can set the kill bit for the control so that it is not accessible from Internet Explorer.::
